name: Re-Rolling!
description:
Hi! Welcome to my first ever solo game jam entry!

Goal

A horde of rats is coming for you. Shoot at them to get rid of them! Be aware that you'll re-roll your weapon once it's out of ammo.

Try to live as long as you can!

Controls

Keyboard + Mouse
Move - WASD
Aim - Mouse Cursor
Shoot - Left Click
Reset Game - Spacebar

Gamepad
Move - Left Stick
Aim - Right Stick
Shoot - Right Trigger (XBox: RT, PlayStation: R2, Switch: ZR)
Reset Game - Start

Known Bugs
  • The timer keeps going after you die.
  • The player sprite appears under terrain after resetting.
Credits

Art assets from Kenney's 1-Bit Pack and The 1-Bit Space Pack!
